title: 900-HP Volkswagen Golf 7 R by Dragy Motorsports Shows What the EA888 Can Do

title: 641-HP Hyundai Ioniq 6 N Seen in Public With No Camouflage
description: The Hyundai Ioniq 6 N has been caught completely undisguised on public roads in California, signaling that Hyundai is nearly ready to bring its high-performance electric sedan to the U.S. market. title: Jeep Wrangler ‘41’ Edition Lands in Japan — But Only 150 Will Be Sold
description: Jeep is a brand steeped in heritage and stories; it remains one of the truly few iconic brands with equally iconic models like the Wrangler. titleSummary: "Exclusive '41' Wrangler Model Limited to Just 150 Japanese Buyers"
descriptionSummary: Jeep's rich history and storied past have cemented its place as an automotive icon, alongside beloved models like the rugged Wrangler. The brand keeps this legacy alive with exclusive limited-edition vehicles that blend heritage with modern flair.

title: This Four-Door 1969 Ford Bronco Restomod Is a Family Off-Roader Done Right
description: Classic Ford Bronco restomods are everywhere these days. Some succeed in achieving show-truck perfection, others are meant for desert-runner toughness, and a few manage to pull off both. They're often loud – figuratively and literally – with high-powered V8s and flashy paint jobs that make subtlety ...
titleSummary: "Family-Friendly Classic Gets Modern Makeover in This Rugged 1969 Ford Bronco Revival"
descriptionSummary: The Ford Bronco restomod scene is abuzz with custom creations. Some excel at blending showroom polish with rugged desert capabilities, while others prioritize raw power or bold aesthetics over understatement.

title: Honda Drops Affordable 2026 Civic Hybrid Lease Deal For November
description: Released roughly a year ago, the Honda Civic Hybrid has taken a different approach to its close rival, the Toyota Corolla Hybrid. descriptionSummary: A year after its launch, the Honda Civic Hybrid diverges from the Toyota Corolla Hybrid's focus on efficiency and affordability, instead positioning itself as a more premium offering with an emphasis on performance and refinement.

title: Hyundai Is Now Locking DIY Owners Out of Their Own Brake Repairs
description: For generations, weekend mechanics took pride in maintaining their own vehicles, swapping oil, replacing filters, and changing brake pads was part of the ownership ritual. Despite EVs supposedly being more affordable to maintain than gas cars, tinkering with your car not only saves money but also ...
titleSummary: Hyundai's Latest Restriction: Owners Can't Even Fix Brakes on Their Own Cars
descriptionSummary: For decades, DIY car enthusiasts have cherished the tradition of hands-on vehicle maintenance, from routine oil changes to more involved repairs like replacing brake pads. With electric vehicles becoming increasingly mainstream, many owners are discovering that self-repairs can be a cost-effective and empowering experience.

title: Super-Rare R32 Nissan Skyline GT-R Nismo For Sale — Only 560 Were Ever Made
description: If there's one car that matches the Porsche 911 in terms of trims and special edition models, it's probably the Nissan Skyline and the eventual standalone R35 GT-R. descriptionSummary: The Porsche 911 is rivalled in terms of variety by few cars, but the Nissan Skyline and its high-performance R35 GT-R sibling come close. For fans of Gran Turismo, this isn't news - many players have spent hours racing these models' numerous trim and special edition variations.

title: Mazda Vision-X Wagon Reimagines the Mazda6 America Never Got
description: Wagons aren't exactly popular in the US, but they've never fully disappeared elsewhere. descriptionSummary: Mazda's wagon offerings may be scarce in America, but they've maintained a loyal following elsewhere. The Mazda6 Wagon remains popular abroad, particularly in Europe and Asia, where its unique blend of style and practicality is highly prized.

title: Banned No More: Dodge’s Hellcat SUV Just Outsmarted California
description: The 2026 Dodge Durango SRT Hellcat is on track to gain 50-state certification, ending regional restrictions caused by emissions regulations. description: Hyundai's 1.6-liter turbocharged Gamma engine is known among tuners and drivers alike for various reasons. descriptionSummary: The 1.6-liter turbocharged Gamma engine has earned a reputation among enthusiasts for its potential to easily unlock extra performance. Its size and design make it highly responsive, and subtle modifications can coax significant gains in power output.

description: MINI’s move to make its Countryman wagon a small SUV turned out to be one of the smartest things the automaker has ever done. descriptionSummary: The Ford F-Series dominates the North American market, but globally, the Toyota Hilux reigns supreme as a trusted workhorse, built on a reputation for ruggedness, endurance, and unwavering dependability that's stood the test of time since the 1960s.

title: Toyota May Pay You for Your Car's Driving Data — But Only If It's Useful
description: Toyota has filed a patent for a system that would pay vehicle owners in exchange for their driving data. titleSummary: Toyota to Reward Drivers with Cash for Sharing Valuable Insights on Their Habits
descriptionSummary: Toyota has applied for a patent on a program that rewards drivers with compensation in exchange for sharing trip-related data from their vehicles, which would be analyzed by the company's system to determine its value.

description: There may be faster accelerating cars these days, but the McLaren F1 still holds a record that no one will likely ever beat. title: You're Charging Your EV Wrong and It's Killing Performance
description: The road clears, you press the pedal, and the car snaps forward like a rubber band. That snap fades if you cook the pack or run it to fumes. The fix isn’t complicated or geeky. descriptionSummary: As you hit the gas, the car surges forward with a responsive burst of energy. But overexertion can dull this performance. For optimal results, aim to maintain a 20-80% charge range daily, where power is balanced and regenerative braking feels effortless.

description: American Honda is issuing a recall for the Civic, specifically models made from 2016 to 2021. The recall is to "inspect a limited number of accessory wheels," totaling 3,276 units, leading to a total vehicle recall affected tally of approximately 406,000. descriptionSummary: The Kia Niro EV is a testament to understated excellence, delivering on its promises without fanfare. Its sleek design conceals a potent electric heart: a 201-horsepower motor paired with a robust 64.8 kWh battery, providing swift acceleration and an incredibly quiet ride.

title: Jaguar Was Closer to Reviving the XJ Than Anyone Realized

The XJ came into the world in 1968, serving as a replacement for both Mark X and S-Type. The first generation lasted an ...
titleSummary: "XJ's Second Chance: Jaguar's Near-Miss at Resurrecting a Beloved Luxury Icon"
descriptionSummary: In 2019, Jaguar bid farewell to its iconic XJ model after a 50-year reign as its flagship sedan. Launched in 1968, it had been the brand's crowning jewel since replacing the Mark X and S-Type models.
